name: Warp Rider
description: Warp Rider! New arcade intense action is here! Dodge and shoot through 30 crazy levels. Difficult obstacles, randomized pitfalls, and shooting sentry guns will keep you on the edge of your seat. Choose from different difficulty settings and put yourself to the ultimate challenge.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Win 7/8/10 Процессор: Intel Core i5 Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Nvidia GTX 660 1GB VRAM DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 400 MB
